title: A new Summoners rift map?

embed.description: SEARCHING MEMORY... TARGET // ANALYZE // PROJECT: YI // HOST PROJECT: FIORA // ASSIST PROJECT: LEONA // UNKNOWN PROJECT: LUCIAN // ASSIST PROJECT: YASUO // UNKNOWN PROJECT: ZED // HOSTILE

body: With the releases of additional Project skins it feels kind of weird in the environment the champions are in for me IMO. How awesome would it be if there was a rework of the Summoners Rift map and looked like the PROJECT overdrive cinematic video :)) just a thought

replies.body: That'd be fucking amazing, me and my friend both said that'd be bloody sick. Yea I reckon it would fit the whole Project side so well. Be so cool, really good idea man. Keep it up!! Just have to persuade Riot :/.. {{champion:245}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:236}}

Lets all not forget about the pool party also haha
Summoners rift original, pool party rift and project rift would be refreshing since we always play the same map visuals
